ner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=iux-JJDQef8:9BGjc8cajOc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn90@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-37-459_7d5e5f1eee2bcb72.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=iux-JJDQef8:9BGjc8cajOc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn92@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-39-441_39f3b4762e832b20.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=iux-JJDQef8:9BGjc8cajOc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn91@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-38-279_d0aba5ed0bc4dcbe.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/iux-JJDQef8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn91@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-53-573_8a14b61c2275773f.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490451},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"The Grand Bohemian Asheville is an upscale, art-centric mountain lodge steps from The Biltmore — but its COVID-19 protocols have room for improvement","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-asheville-hotel-review","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. <a href=\"https://www.insider-inc.com/commerce-on-insider-inc/\">Learn more.</a></i></p><p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.htmllection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c7e676f5b3100117249d1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian lead image\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>I recently headed to Asheville, North Carolina for a fall getaway within easy driving distance.</li><li>I chose the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> in part because it falls under the Marriott-Bonvoy umbrella and I trusted their COVID-19 protocols.</li><li>I stayed in a comped <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Standard Room</a>, which typically costs $354 during the fall high season for a midweek stay.&#160;</li><li>I was impressed with the art-forward design, but the hotel could have better enforced COVID-19 protocols.</li><li>Read more: <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-hotels-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Is it safe to stay in a hotel right now? An infectious disease doctor, a cleaning expert, and hotel reps all share what you should know before you check-in.</a></li></ul><p>As a travel writer, I had exotic trips to Turkey, South Africa, and Europe waiting for me in 2020 — and then a global pandemic hit that restricted my travel to adventures I could drive to from Miami, Florida. Long story short, the southeastern United States became my COVID-19 sanctuary, with <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/is-travel-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">travel safety</a> becoming my biggest priority. To enjoy the fall season, I planned a trip to charming Asheville, North Carolina.</p><p>Like many travelers right now, I originally planned to stay in an Airbnb due to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/are-airbnbs-safe-coronavirus\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">experts recommending vacation rentals</a> because of reduced contact with other guests. Much to my surprise, however, the pandemic wasn't stopping high season in Asheville, and even cramped <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-rv-rentals\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">RVs</a> and lower-rated homes were going for $200 a night. In an effort to find more affordable and comfortable options, I turned to hotels.</p><p>However, I wanted to find a property I trusted to handle the pandemic safely. As a longtime fan of the Kessler brand, I was drawn to their Asheville haunt: the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a>.&#160;</p><p>Kessler is part of <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&xs=1&url=https%3A%2F%2Fautograph-hotels.marriott.com%2Ft.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Marriott's Autograph Collection</a> and pre-coronavirus, Kessler properties offered an ideal getaway for couples, girls trips, families, and even business travelers looking for a luxury hotel that comes in at a more affordable price point. The brand's art-driven hotels are always in charming destinations, and their inherent creativity feeds into everything from the food and drinks to the in-house art program, the decor, and even the brand's signature Poseidon Spa. I have stayed at Kessler properties in Savannah, St. Augustine, and Mountain Brook and they've always been a treat.&#160;</p><p>Having familiarity with Kessler properties and knowing their attention to detail helped ease my mind. Plus, this particular mainstay was in a coveted location in charming Biltmore Village, directly across the street from the iconic <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g60742-d102846-Reviews-Biltmore-Asheville_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Biltmore Estate</a>. I booked a <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Standard Room with a King bed</a>, which was priced at $354 per night, but was comped for review purposes.</p><p>I felt confident that a Kessler property in Asheville would handle the pandemic well, and, for the most part, I was right. As part of the Marriott-Bonvoy family, the <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.htmllection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grand Bohemian</a> adheres to the hotel giant's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hotel-precautions-coronavirus#marriott-bonvoy-19\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Commitment to Clean program</a>, which has specific tenets regarding new cleaning protocols, social distancing, masks, limiting person-to-person contact, and more.</p><p>There were mostly couples staying at the hotel while I was there, staff was adhering to the new cleaning protocols, and the hotel didn't feel even close to full. That said, I was there on a Monday and Tuesday night, which aren't typically peak travel days, and I did find that the hotel could be better enforcing its mask-wearing policy with guests.</p><p>Still, with its luxury hunter lodge atmosphere, idyllic Biltmore Village location, spacious rooms, eclectic pop art, and tasty food and drink, <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&awinaffid=257137&clickref=&ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.htmllection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> was a great place to call home for a few days.&#160;</p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-1\">The first impression</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-6\">The room</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-12\">On-site amenities</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-17\">What's nearby</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-18\"><strong>What others say</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-19\">What you need to know</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-20\">COVID-19 Policies</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection-hotel-review#-21\"><strong>The bottom line</strong></a></li><li><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Book the Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville, Autograph Collection starting at $158 per night</a></li></ul><h2>Keep reading to see why I was so impressed by the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a>.</h2>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d979252a4107d1284547da7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"1 Hotel Reviews Banner first impression\" height=\"151\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">BI</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c56e86f5b310011724864?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville, Autograph Collection Hotel Review\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The hotel&#39;s impressive, Tudor-style exterior set the tone for my stay from the get-go.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>When I first pulled up to the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a>, its impressive, Tudor-style exterior set the tone from the get-go. I drove around back and found the driveway, where drawn burgundy drapes added an air of luxury. I had found my slice of mountain paradise.</p><p>The hotel surrounded the valet area, so when I got out of my car and looked up, I saw four stories of hotel rooms on all sides and elegant light fixtures suspended from a covered deck above. In what otherwise gave off an Old English, Christmas-y vibe, there was an installation of a modern, funky, bright red cello, the first sign of the hotel's innovative art program.&#160;</p><p>The only parking option available to me was valet, and I was surprised there wasn't a self-park option in the age of a pandemic. While I wasn't fully comfortable with valet, I gave the hotel credit for ensuring the attendants were masked and practiced social distancing and reluctantly handed over my keys.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c588469331a0011bc669b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian mask signage\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Signage by the elevators reminded guests to follow COVID-19 protocols.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>I had stayed at a Marriott-Bonvoy property one other time during the pandemic, and was already comfortable with their COVID-19 protocols. Kessler is part of the Marriott-Bonvoy family, so the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> adhered to the brand's&#160; <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/hotel-precautions-coronavirus#marriott-bonvoy-19\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Commitment to Clean program</a>. This was confirmed when I walked inside and immediately saw multiple hand sanitizing stations and familiar signage mandating that guests wear masks and stay at least six feet apart.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c5a016f5b310011724880?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian lobby  furniture 2\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The lobby exuded hunter-chic lodge vibes.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>We arrived at 2 p.m. on a Monday afternoon, and there was no wait at reception. The spacious lobby exuded an eclectic-chic, hunter lodge vibe. Details included carved wooden walls, hanging candelabra light fixtures, mounted deer heads, leather chairs, dark wooden desks with purple low-lighting, bear sculptures, and a statue of a wild hog wearing a tacky tourist hat.</p><p>The lobby was also scattered with colorful paintings and modern art pieces typical of Kessler hotels. Lights that looked like antlers hung from a limestone brick ceiling, hovering over seating areas of textured accent furniture below.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c5a8e69331a0011bc66b3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian front desk reception\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>We checked in at the front desk, where everyone wore masks.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>When we went to check in, I noticed there was no plexiglass at the front desk. I was surprised by this since it's part of Marriott-Bonvoy's protocols. However, the website did say that the rollout of plexiglass dividers would be gradual. Luckily, masks were worn by all throughout the check-in process, and the desk was deep enough to feel like you didn't have to get too close to one another.&#160;</p><p>It's important to note that I could have had a completely contactless check-in through the Marriott Mobile App, but I didn't know about that at the time. Instead, I gave the hotel my credit card information over the phone in advance, so the only time we exchanged anything was when I signed for the room and collected our room keys.</p><p>As I headed to my room, I noticed an easel by the elevator with a mounted sign reminding guests to wear their masks, social distance, and wash hands. Right across from it was a hand sanitizing station.</p><p>Overall, the check-in process was smooth. The lobby was vacuous and there was no one else in there besides the friendly staff behind the desk, my guest, and myself. But not all guests were following the mask mandate and staff didn't seem to be enforcing it. Had there been more people, say during a weekend stay, I might have felt less comfortable.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d979264d831b2141f07abd1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"2 Hotel Reviews Banner The room\" height=\"151\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c615b69331a0011bc66eb?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Asheville bedroom\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The King bed was plush, luxurious, and made for a comfortable night of sleep.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>I booked an entry-level <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Standard Room</a>, which comes with a King bed or two Queen beds and either city or mountain views. These rooms start at $158 in the winter low season, but can soar into the $600s on weekends during the fall high season, which is when I visited.</p><p>My room was $354 per night midweek, but it felt worthy of the high price thanks to being a spacious corner unit with a plush King bed and a view of the Blue Ridge Mountains. If possible, ask ahead for a corner unit with mountain views to get the most value out of a Standard Room.</p><p>Walking into our room, I entered a small hallway lined by cabinets on one side and a bathroom on the other.&#160;</p><p>However, it was the King bed and its velvet teal headboard that immediately caught my eye and made the room pop. Two nightstands flanked either side of the bed, complete with lamps with bases that looked like antlers. An antler chandelier over the bed completed the look.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c64c169331a0011bc670d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian bedroom view\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>This particular room had a beautiful view of the Blue Ridge Mountains, but only through a small square window.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>While there was one window to the left of the bed, I was surprised at how small it was for the going rate and the room being considered \"mountain view.\" I would have liked a bigger window, particularly because the Blue Ridge Mountains are especially beautiful during the fall.&#160;</p><p>Across from the bed, there was a mounted flatscreen TV, a six-drawer dresser, two leather accent chairs, and an alcove with a sleek white desk.&#160;The room also included a small closet with an iron, an ironing board, a luggage rack, and two plush robes wrapped in protective plastic.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c65656f5b3100117248e3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian room amenities\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The minibar included complimentary coffee, tea, and hand sanitizer packets, as well as bottled water and Kessler wine available for purchase.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The in-room bar had the standard offerings of a single-cup coffee machine, free coffee capsules, and tea bags.&#160;The only thing not standard about it was the bottle of Kessler red wine, which was available for $38 a bottle. I opted to buy it and was not disappointed.&#160;</p><p>There were also individual packets of hand sanitizer at the minibar, which was the only COVID-19 amenity in the room.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c67c069331a0011bc6727?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian bathroom entrance\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The bathroom was spacious and luxurious.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The bathroom was large and truly luxurious. Marble floors and a teal wall with candle sconces offset a quirky wood vanity, a large soaking tub, and separate toilet and spa shower areas.</p><p>In addition to the free Kessler-brand bath products, bath salts and aromatherapy bubble bath from Poseidon Spa were by the tub and available for $35. While I didn't take advantage of them on this trip, I have been to Poseidon Spa at other Kessler properties and can attest that their products are wonderful.&#160;</p><p>The only downside was that the bathroom only had curtains, rather than a true door, separating it from the bedroom. Whether or not this is a problem depends on who you're traveling with, but it's worth noting to avoid any potentially awkward scenarios.&#160;</p><p>Housekeeping gave us the option of declining their services, which I appreciated, and I did forgo housekeeping in light of COVID-19. If I wanted new towels or bathroom amenities, all I had to do was call the front desk and have them brought to the room and left at the door.</p><p>While I was disappointed with the small, lone window, overall I found our entry-level room to be a luxurious and cozy stay. The bed was especially comfortable and the hotel was very quiet, which made for a great night's sleep.&#160;</p><p>&#160;</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa03e1a69331a0011bc6bc3?format=jpeg\" alt=\"grand bohemian hotel asheville suite\" height=\"598\" width=\"797\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Premium rooms and suites come with separate living areas and some have larger windows.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Marriott</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Aside from <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Standard Rooms</a>, there are also <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Manor House Guest Rooms</a>, <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Premium Rooms</a>, and <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Suites</a>.</p><p>Manor House Guest Rooms are in a separate building just steps from the main building, and offer all of the hotel's standard amenities, plus complimentary wine and cheese on Friday and Saturday afternoons. These rooms start at $255 in the low season.</p><p>Premium Rooms and Suites have separate living rooms and some have private balconies that offer the best way to take in the sweeping views. These rooms typically start in the mid-$400s.&#160;</p><p>I was perfectly content with my entry-level room's spacious size and posh decor, but those seeking extra space or who want to ensure an exceptional view may find the upgraded rooms with balconies worth the additional cost.&#160;</p><h2><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Compare room types and prices for the Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a></h2>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d9792784b6507152c489b99?format=jpeg\" alt=\"3 Hotel Reviews Banner On site amenities\" height=\"151\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c70426f5b310011724942?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Red Stag Grill\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Red Stag Grill serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner in a cozy atmosphere.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The hotel's only bar-restaurant is <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g60742-d1404635-Reviews-Red_Stag_Grill-Asheville_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">The Red Stag Grill</a>, which was open according to North Carolina's COVID-19 Phase 3 reopening rules. Guests and seating were adequately spaced out, and the restaurant staff was limiting the number of people allowed to sit at tables and around the bar.&#160;</p><p>All Kessler hotels are committed to culinary creativity, and here, guests can expect a European comfort food menu with an American mountain-town twist. The sultry decor included wooden tables, plush banquette seating reminiscent of Mad Hatter chairs a la \"Alice In Wonderland,\" deer heads, tree branch light fixtures, and electric red lighting.&#160;</p><p>The same Kessler wine found in rooms for purchase is also available at the bar, along with an extensive list of creative cocktails, other wines, local beers, and spirits.&#160;</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c73116f5b310011724952?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Asheville art gallery\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Interesting art installations could be found at every turn.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>Being art-driven hotels, every Kessler property has an art gallery filled with pieces by local, regional, and internationally-recognized artists. The gallery at the <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> was open with limited hours and displayed everything from paintings and sculptures to glass art and jewelry.</p><p>The whole hotel functioned as an extension of the art gallery, however, with oil and contemporary paintings, out-of-the-box sculptures, and art installations scattered everywhere from the valet area to inside some guestrooms.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c74d16f5b31001172495f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Poseidon Spa\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Poseidon Spa was available by appointment only, and guests&#39; temperatures were taken at the door.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>There is a 24-hour Artful Wellness Center with free weights, cardio machines, and other workout equipment, but due to COVID-19, it had a four-person maximum.</p><p>The onsite Poseidon Spa, a signature of the Kessler Brand, is a small, but relaxing space with multiple treatment rooms where you can get massages, facials, relaxing body treatments, and more. Because of COVID-19, access to the spa was by appointment only, a limited number of people were allowed in the waiting room and lounge area, and temperatures were checked at the entrance.</p><p>Usually, the hotel also has multiple boardrooms equipped with state-of-the-art technology, but these facilities aren't currently open.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9c75806f5b310011724969?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Grand Bohemian Asheville outdoor deck\" height=\"900\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Located on the fourth floor, the covered deck was a great place to drink my morning coffee and take in the beautiful Asheville weather.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jennifer Agress/Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p>The only outdoor space was a lovely covered deck that connected both sides of the fourth floor. The deck was scattered with tables and chairs and made for a nice place to relax and drink coffee while enjoying the beautiful fall weather. It wasn't particularly crowded except when one family used the space for a kid's birthday party.</p><p>I found protocols and cleaning standards were being enforced at all on-site amenities, except for the fact that guests weren't always being told to keep their masks on.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d97928ad831b2140609a1c0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"4 Hotel Reviews Banner What&#39;s nearby\" height=\"151\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a>&#160;is located right at the entrance to charming Biltmore Village, one of the trendiest parts of Asheville. The <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attraction_Review-g60742-d102846-Reviews-Biltmore-Asheville_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Biltmore House and its surrounding 8,000-acre estate</a> (inarguably Asheville's most iconic site) is directly across the street. This hotel is great for travelers who want to explore the gardens, history, winery, restaurants, trails, and picture-perfect views the Biltmore has to offer.</p><p>In Biltmore Village, there are a slew of shops, restaurants, and cafes within walking distance. Even though the Biltmore itself is just across the street, its sheer size means you'll still need to drive there. Give yourself at least an afternoon there &#8212; it's worth it.</p><p>You can get to downtown Asheville's popular strip of breweries, restaurants, and bars in less than 10 minutes by car, and the revered <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Restaurant_Review-g1552723-d7855702-Reviews-Sierra_Nevada_Brewery-Mills_River_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Sierra Nevada Brewing Co.</a> is a 25-minute drive away.</p><h2><a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.expedia.com%2FCheap-Flights-To-Asheville.d6034866.Travel-Guide-Flights\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Check flight prices to Asheville on Expedia</a></h2>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d97929ab15102103d15bdb7?format=jpeg\" alt=\"5 Hotel Reviews Banner What others say\" height=\"151\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> earns an <a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g60742-d1163561-Reviews-Grand_Bohemian_Hotel_Asheville_Autograph_Collection-Asheville_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">\"Excellent\" rating on Trip Advisor</a>, with 4.5 out of 5 stars, and an 8.9 out of 10 on <a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Booking.com</a>.</p><p>Most of the reviews commend the hotel for its beautiful decor, relaxed surroundings, welcoming feel, first-rate service, and how well it's handling COVID-19.&#160;</p><p>As one reviewer from September 2020 said, \"Spent three days here on our first foray out since early March. Hotel in great location and staff was friendly. COVID protocols were in place and were being followed by staff and guests. Room nice, bed comfortable and very clean. Room was serviced upon request and we had it done when we were out for the day. Very quiet and relaxing.\"</p><p>That said, while few guests had anything bad to say about the hotel itself, it is important to note that some guests did comment that they didn't feel like COVID-19 rules, like ensuring all guests always wore masks, were being strictly enforced. I saw this too, but because I was there on weekdays and it was less crowded, I wasn't as worried.&#160;</p><h2><a href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.tripadvisor.com/Hotel_Review-g60742-d1163561-Reviews-Grand_Bohemian_Hotel_Asheville_Autograph_Collection-Asheville_North_Carolina.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Read reviews, compare prices, and book Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville on Tripadvisor</a></h2>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d9b60d7695b583f20756fde?format=jpeg\" alt=\"6 Hotel Reviews Banner What you need to know\" height=\"151\" width=\"1200\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Business Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><strong>Who stays here:</strong> This hotel is great for couples, families, girlfriends, and business travelers who want to stay at an upscale property without the stuffy feel. With its prime Biltmore Village address, it's a great hotel for those who want to explore all the city has to offer.&#160;&#160;</p><p><strong>We like:</strong> The Red Stag Grill somehow manages to be fancy, casual, and wickedly charming all at once. The vibe is relaxed, the food is European comfort food-meets-North Carolina mountains and the eclectic decor gives you plenty to look at while you nosh and sip.</p><p><strong>We love (don't miss this feature!): </strong>The art-forward decor. Art influences every inch of the hotel, and no detail is overlooked. Every time I walked into a room, I noticed something new.&#160;</p><p><strong>We think you should know:</strong> The bathroom is separated from the bedroom by a thin curtain rather than an actual door. However, a few rooms do have actual doors that close off the bathtub and bathroom area, so make sure you request that ahead of time if that's a necessity.</p><p><strong>We'd do this differently next time: </strong>I was disappointed by my tiny room window. Next time, I'd ask ahead of time for a room with a larger window, or spring for an upgraded room with a balcony.</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f1f2225aee6a822c9029ff4?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Hotel Reviews Banner COVID 19 policies\" height=\"418\" width=\"3335\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">BI</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">The Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville </a>follows Marriott Bonvoy's Commitment to Clean program. This program outlines all health and safety protocols created in light of COVID-19, including:&#160;</p><ul><li>Mask requirements for guests and hotel employees in all indoor public areas</li><li>More frequent cleaning and hospital-grade disinfectants, special air purifying systems and electrostatic sprayers used on all surfaces, property-wide</li><li>Hand sanitizer dispensers in the lobby, elevator banks, fitness and meeting spaces and near the front desk</li><li>Hand sanitizer wipes available in all rooms for guests' personal use</li><li>Rearranged or removed furniture to accommodate more space between guests</li><li>Signage in common areas reminding guests to wear masks and maintain social distancing</li><li>Contactless check-in and check-out through the Marriott Mobile App</li><li>Adding plexiglass partitions at front desks for safer in-person interactions, should they be necessary</li><li>Flexible cancellation policies, with no-penalty cancellation available up until 24 hours before your stay</li></ul><p>For the most part, I felt these policies were being strictly followed, but there were some areas for improvement. I stayed on a Monday and Tuesday night, so the hotel was not completely full. However, I wouldn't say mask-wearing was strictly enforced for guests, and I would have liked to see that. I was cognizant of the fact that this wary COVID traveler might have been uncomfortable on a more crowded stay.</p><p>Additionally, there were no plexiglass partitions at check-in and valet was the only option for parking, which not everyone may be comfortable with right now.&#160;</p><p>That said, I appreciated that housekeeping was optional and that all staff were strictly following protocols and wearing masks at all times.&#160;</p>\n\t\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e27582662fa8110bc34a994?format=jpeg\" alt=\"7 Hotel Reviews Banner Bottom Line\" height=\"151\" width=\"1201\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">BI</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<p><a href=\"https://www.awin1.com/cread.php?awinmid=6776&#38;awinaffid=257137&#38;clickref=&#38;ued=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.booking.com%2Fhotel%2Fus%2Fgrand-bohemian-asheville-autograph-collection.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> is a luxury hotel with an art-forward aesthetic mixed with a cabin-chic feel. Its prime location in Biltmore Village, less than a 10-minute drive from downtown Asheville, makes it a great place for travelers who want easy access to all the charm Asheville has to offer.&#160;&#160;</p><p>While the <a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville</a> might be out of reach during the fall high season when rooms can soar to $600, it's an exceptional value during the low winter season when entry-level rooms drop as low as $158 per night. I found my entry-level room to be spacious and well-appointed, but did find the lone, small window to be disappointing. For exceptional views, it may be worth upgrading to a Premium Room with a balcony.</p><p>Throughout my stay, all employees were masked, dining and common area furniture was spaced out, and there were signs demanding masks and social distancing everywhere. However, it's key to note that COVID-19 protocols could have been more strictly enforced for guests. While the hotel was largely empty during my midweek stay, during peak weekend days I may not have felt as comfortable since not all guests were always masked, and hotel staff did not comment on this.&#160;</p><p>That said, I am always an advocate for Kessler properties. The boutique luxury brand ensures a high-end stay with careful attention to detail, and the Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville was no exception.</p><h2><a href=\"https://prf.hn/click/camref:1011l8bes/destination:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marriott.com%2Fhotels%2Ftravel%2Favlak-grand-bohemian-hotel-asheville-autograph-collection%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Book the Grand Bohemian Hotel Asheville, Autograph Collection starting from $158 per night</a></h2>\n</div><div class=\"read-original\">Read the b6507152c489b99?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn10@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-52-127_50bfd8da3c8f4f71.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c70426f5b310011724942?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn1@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-36-771_0c20feaa860ba387.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c73116f5b310011724952?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn65@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-55-479_39ead2738f95bb5b.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c74d16f5b31001172495f?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx14/cdn42@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-37-026_4163b8847c6235a8.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f9c75806f5b310011724969?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn47@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-42-197_532fc261470ccafe.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d97928ad831b2140609a1c0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn74@2020_4/2020/11/03/05-31-59-110_d80e0d95babc043d.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d97929ab15102103d15bdb7?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn59@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-51-203_9ff3acd9ca11b57b.webp","https://i.insider.com/5d9b60d7695b583f20756fde?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn78@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-45-686_0df23b73f72c5042.webp","https://i.insider.com/5f1f2225aee6a822c9029ff4?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn3@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-40-424_cb78cee8dd138e51.webp","https://i.insider.com/5e27582662fa8110bc34a994?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn31@2020_4/2020/11/03/05-31-45-113_507fe28280279830.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=RdnJoWdjraM:1u0rX5IhSIc:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn21@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-54-490_a2d7da3fe5a0d55b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=RdnJoWdjraM:1u0rX5IhSIc:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn68@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-51-352_694c6a0b0dee870e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=RdnJoWdjraM:1u0rX5IhSIc:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn100@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-48-190_4942a3b8c1d98b2b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/RdnJoWdjraM":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn81@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-54-856_d7fcca37aa3e5819.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490708},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"Young people running for elected office face attacks on their age but say they're capitalizing on a 'shift' in US politics","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-happens-when-a-young-person-runs-for-office-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f9cc55969331a0011bc68b0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"young candidates\" height=\"988\" width=\"2252\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Josh Holstein (L), Christina Haswood (C), and Sam Grady (R) are seeking elected office in their state legislatures.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Josh Holstein, Christina Haswood, Sam Grady/Provided</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Several candidates under the age of 30 spoke to Business Insider about why they're seeking elected office and their experience campaigning as young people.&#160;</li>\n<li>Christina Haswood, 26 and a Democrat from Kansas, said her background in public health and as a Navajo woman inspired her to run for the state legislature.</li>\n<li>Josh Holstein, a 19-year-old Republican from West Virginia, said he was running as a result of local support for President Donald Trump and because of a \"shift\" toward Republican values in the state.</li>\n<li>Sam Grady, 28 and a Democrat from Ohio, explained his strained relationship with establishment Democrats in his district and rebuffed their rejection of him.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Sam Grady, 28, in Ohio, would be one of the youngest members of the Ohio Statehouse if elected. Grady said he decided to run as a write-in candidate in the primary race because he was frustrated local Democrats in Richland County, Ohio, had neglected to put up a candidate to compete against Republicans.</p><p>In April, Grady won the primary race and officially became the party's candidate for the District 2 seat in the Ohio House of Representatives.&#160;&#160;</p><p>But Grady, who is currently attending classes to finish his undergrad degree at a branch campus of The Ohio State University, said he has not received the support of the Richland County Democratic Party.</p><p>Local Democrats have rebuked him, he said.</p><p>Grady speculated their distance from him began in May when he used the hashtag \"IAmAntifa\" on a Facebook post. The hashtag was popular on social media at the time, he said. Antifa, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/what-is-antifa-movement-charlottesville-va-trump-news-2017-8#what-is-antifa-1\">short for \"anti-fascist,\" describes a decentralized, leaderless movement</a> dedicated to combatting right-wing authoritarianism and white supremacy.</p><p>The group has drawn the ire of Republicans and President Trump in particular, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/barr-gop-present-antifa-major-threat-but-no-evidence-killings-2020-7\">who has threatened to classify it as a terrorist organization.&#160;</a></p><p>Not long after, Larry Weirich, the chairman of the Richland County Democratic Party, said in a news release the party did \"NOT and will NOT condone his actions or statements. Furthermore, we DO NOT and WILL NOT endorse his candidacy during the 2020 general election.\"</p><p>When the <a href=\"https://www.mansfieldnewsjournal.com/story/news/2020/06/02/democrats-condemn-sam-grady-candidate/3126283001/\">Mansfield News Journal</a> requested clarification, Weirich said \"there's just a lot of things that we don't want to be associated with,\" pointing to Grady's social media posts but did not say which the party disagreed with. The Richland County Democratic Party did not return Business Insider's request for clarification.&#160;</p><p>Grady, who had refused to participate in the county party's vetting process earlier this year, said he felt local Democrats were \"completely shooting themselves in the foot\" in denouncing him.&#160;&#160;</p><p>\"The local county party is basically a collection of 12 baby boomers who get around monthly and have dinner,\" Grady said. \"They're not serious about running or winning anything. But I think it's an interesting microcosm of the national Democratic Party.</p><p>Grady said he believes his beef with the local Democratic Party likely represents a microcosm of young people's general attitudes toward establishment politics.</p><p>\"All the young people I talk to in this district have either feelings of extreme anger of what the local party did or extreme apathy about it,\" he said. \"I'm sure local Democratic parties in other parts of the country are much younger, much more diverse, and much less afraid of being judged negatively by Republicans.\"&#160;</p><p>He added: \"Hopefully it's not a trend that's a rejection of the two parties, but a trend that's more about young people primarying establishment candidates and taking over their Democratic parties local and statewide.\"&#160;</p><p>As <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/2020/03/22/us/politics/young-voters-biden-sanders.html\">The New York Times</a> reported in March, while they're poised to gain considerable electoral clout at the polls this year, young people have often felt that candidates don't speak to them, leading them to sit out the election.&#160;</p><p>While he acknowledged his region is largely red — Trump won 66% of the vote in Richland County in 2016 — he's also said met like-minded young people during the course of his campaign even in his \"very rural, very religious, conservative community.\"&#160;</p><p>\"I've met a lot of young, local activists in the community — like very left-wing activists — talking about things like wealth inequality, the militarization of police, and even stuff like normalizing sex work. It's been one of the few positive feelings in what's been a cynical and negative process.\"&#160;</p><h2>\"We're seeing that our representatives don't really look like us\"</h2><p>Four years ago, Christina Haswood cast a ballot for the first time. This week, she's hoping voters in Kansas 10th district will cast a vote for her.</p><p>At 26, Haswood, a Democrat and lifelong resident of Lawrence, is aiming to become one of the youngest members of the Kansas State Legislature. She hadn't always anticipated a career in politics, she told Business Insider, but as a Navajo woman with a background in public health, she was drawn toward one.</p><p>Her journey into politics had been sparked in high school. During a class her first year she realized all of her classmates, like her, had family members with Type 2 diabetes, a disease affecting more than 23% of the Native American population, according to the <a href=\"https://minorityhealth.hhs.gov/omh/browse.aspx?lvl=4&lvlid=33d=33\">Department of Health and Human Services</a>.&#160;&#160;</p><p>\"I knew there was work that needed to be done in Kansas,\" Haswood said.</p><p>In February, Haswood contacted Wichita Rep. Ponka-we Victors when she heard about legislation to address missing and murdered Indigenous people. The two kept in contact, and eventually, Victors recommended Haswood enter the race for the state legislature, she said.</p><p>She said her age created excitement but it was also used in attacks lobbed at her from her primary opponents, both of whom she beat in May, making her the presumptive winner as state Republicans did not put forth a challenger, the <a href=\"https://www2.ljworld.com/news/state-government/2020/aug/04/haswood-wins-contested-primary-will-become-third-native-american-in-history-of-kansas-legislature/\">Lawrence Jornal-World</a> reported.</p><p>\"I would go to roundtable talks and I would look around the room and see I was the only person of color, the only Indigenous person, and the only young person there,\" she said. \"The only young Indigenous woman, the only Navajo woman there. This list keeps going on.\"</p><p>Haswood&#160;brought on younger people to work for her campaign. In the primary, her campaign manager was 25, a year younger than her, and some staffers had only recently graduated high school. With the help of one high school volunteer, Haswood even crafted viral TikTok videos, the social-media app particularly <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/biden-and-trump-gen-z-tiktok-2020-9\">popular with young people and largely untapped by politicians</a>. The videos helped solicit donations and encouraged people to phone bank for her, she said.</p><p>\"With more younger people getting involved, we're seeing that our representatives don't really look like us,\" Haswood said. \"I think that brought a drive for change because I know during my campaign, issues such as criminal justice reform, police brutality, and racism came up.\"&#160;</p><h2>Ushering in a \"new generation of leadership\"</h2><p>Josh Holstein in Boone County, West Virginia didn't think he was ready to run for office in 2020 but said he wanted to bring \"a new generation of leadership\" to state politics. At 19, he'd be the youngest current member of the West Virginia House of Delegates.</p><p>Holstein, a Republican candidate for District 23, told Business Insider he didn't grow up in an overtly political household, but getting involved in local politics wasn't difficult.&#160;</p><p>\"Here in West Virginia, the Republican candidates really seem like a family,\" Holstein said. \"If people want to volunteer it doesn't matter — they all feel like we're family here working toward the same goal. They treated me like an adult. That's something I really admired.</p><p>\"They say this is a deeply red state, and that might seem true from the outside looking in, but I'm the first Republican in my entire family,\" he added. \"I remember there was a time when anyone mentioned Republican politics — not just my parents — but my extended family, it was like you were an outcast.\"</p><p>Like Haswood, Holstein's experience as a young candidate has been mixed.</p><p>His opponents, he said, have \"played on my lack of experience and holding office.\"</p><p>\"That's been the biggest obstacle. Some people say I'm too young, but then I have to talk about them about issues, and it alleviates their fears.\"</p><p>But his age has also presented opportunities, Holstein said.&#160;</p><p>\"People say hey we need somebody young, somebody, with energy, somebody with a fresh face, and somebody who wants to work and not just hold a title,\" he said. \"I would say that has resonated much better than the opposition.\"&#160;</p><p>Holstein told Business Insider he first planned to run in 2022, but because of local enthusiasm for President Donald Trump (<a href=\"http://services.sos.wv.gov/apps/elections/results/results.aspx?year=2016&eid=22&county=Boone&type=OFFICIALype=OFFICIAL\">the president won 86% of Boone County in 2016</a>), he decided to run this year. Holstein described himself as an \"anti-establishment\" candidate, which is bolstered by his new-on-the-scene status.</p><p>\"There's a shift happening here, and I decided to run because I'm supportive of that shift,\" he said.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"expanded-coverage\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-source=\"insider-voter-guide\" data-show-header=\"true\">Expanded Coverage Module: insider-voter-guide</bi-shortcode><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/what-happens-when-a-young-person-runs-for-office-2020-10'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=-TSFZBQXHwk:Iu7OMKCIrH4:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=-TSFZBQXHwk:Iu7OMKCIrH4:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/-TSFZBQXHwk\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 02 Nov 2020 23:02:32 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f9cc57969331a0011bc68b1?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"e2cae4d2396fa66e87e12ff7ff7b8167","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn56@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-34-420_02f2cf601cd34a6d.webp","destWidth":1315,"destHeight":986,"sourceBytes":46766,"destBytes":46766,"author":"insider@insider.com (Connor Perrett)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f9cc55969331a0011bc68b0?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn61@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-52-613_9b46276bca01504d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=-TSFZBQXHwk:Iu7OMKCIrH4:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn86@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-58-601_81771da015a89cb3.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=-TSFZBQXHwk:Iu7OMKCIrH4:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn44@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-53-951_74c88edda5e364b5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=-TSFZBQXHwk:Iu7OMKCIrH4:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn45@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-54-668_5dafb3f9a4d3f373.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/-TSFZBQXHwk":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn36@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-58-674_8bebd5efd3d14c1b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490528},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"Everything you need to know about election polls in 2020","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/everything-you-need-to-know-to-understand-2020-election-polls-2020-10","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f91d5f421211300187403d0?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Trump and Biden\" height=\"1952\" width=\"3905\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Democratic nominee and former Vice President Joe Biden currently holds a ten point lead in national polls over President Donald Trump.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Patrick Semansky/AP Photo</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Democratic nominee Joe Biden has about a 10 percentage point lead over President Donald Trump in an average of national polls before Election Day.</li>\n<li>National polling in 2016 was about as accurate as any presidential election since 1968, even if Trump's upset victory shocked millions of Americans.</li>\n<li>Business Insider answered some of the most common polling-related questions for the 2020 election.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>After a hotly contested presidential race in November 2016 that shocked the nation, people from around the globe are clamoring for a glimpse of what may happen in 2020.&#160;</p><p>It's easy to get confused by political polls and surveys due to their intricacies, averages, and varying methodologies, so Business Insider answered some of the most common polling-related questions of the 2020 election:</p><h2>What do the polls say?</h2><p>In the race for president, Biden is currently leading Trump by about 10 percentage points in an average of national polls from <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/national/\">FiveThirtyEight</a>. <a href=\"https://forecast.decisiondeskhq.com/president\">Decision Desk HQ,</a>&#160;an election forecasting company, predicts that Biden has an 86.7% chance of winning the election.</p><p>If Biden wins in November, it will likely be because of his robust leads in a handful of critical swing states, which include <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pennsylvania-is-the-most-important-state-on-the-map-now-2020-10\">Pennsylvania</a> — a state that Trump won in 2016 by less than one percentage point and holds 20 electoral votes. Biden leads Trump by an average of <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/pennsylvania/\">4.8 percentage points</a> in state polls, according to FiveThirtyEight, and <a href=\"https://forecast.decisiondeskhq.com/president/P2020PA\">DDHQ</a> predicts Biden has a 74.5% chance of winning the Keystone State given that lead.</p><p>While he still leads in many swing states, Biden's edge in Florida, a key swing state, is razor sharp. Florida possesses 29 electoral votes — the second most of any state — and was won by Trump in 2016 by just <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/elections/2016/results/florida\">1.2 percentage points,</a> or nearly 113,000 votes. In an average of Florida polls, Biden currently leads Trump by <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/florida/\">2.5 points</a> and <a href=\"https://forecast.decisiondeskhq.com/president/P2020FL\">DDHQ suggests</a> he has a 63% chance of winning in the Sunshine State.</p><h2>Could the polls be wrong?</h2><p>Yes. There is a very good chance that the polls are \"wrong\" and will not have precisely predicted the final election results. The biggest question on election night will be just \"how wrong\" the polls were.</p><p>Incorrect polling is one of the most common critiques of the 2016 presidential election, but in truth, the polls were not off by much. Trump, for example, outperformed the national polls in 2016 by only about <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/2016-election-forecast/national-polls/\">2 percentage points.</a> In fact, the polls were about as accurate as they've been in any presidential election since 1968, <a href=\"https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/the-real-story-of-2016/\">according to Nate Silver</a>, founder of FiveThirtyEight.</p><p>While the polls were slightly off in 2016, the effects were magnified as Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton's lead in swing states was incredibly slim. Just a <a href=\"https://www.270towin.com/2016-polls-clinton-trump/\">day before Election Day</a>, Clinton and Trump were in a deadlock in North Carolina and Florida. As November 3 approaches, Biden currently holds close to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/north-carolina/\">two</a> and <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/florida/\">three percentage point</a> leads in those states and is in a better position than Clinton was.</p><h2>According to polling, which states are closest?</h2><p>According to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/2020-election-forecast/\">FiveThirtyEight</a>, the nine closest races are in Georgia, Iowa, Ohio, Texas, North Carolina, Arizona, Florida, Pennsylvania, and Wisconsin. Of these, Biden is currently leading in all but Iowa, Ohio, and Texas.</p><p>Polling in swing states on the eve of the election:</p><ul><li>An average of recent <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/texas/\">polls in <strong>Texas</strong></a> estimate that Trump is leading in the Lone Star State by just one percentage points. If Biden can flip Texas Democratic for the <a href=\"https://www.270towin.com/states/texas\">first time since 1976</a>, he is all but guaranteed an electoral college victory.</li><li>Biden is ahead in the polls by an <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/north-carolina/\">average of 2 percentage points</a> in <strong>North Carolina</strong>, a state that Trump desperately <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-campaign-needs-to-win-in-north-carolina-or-else-2020-10\">needs to bolster</a> his chances of reelection. A large proportion of the results in North Carolina will be known on the <a href=\"https://abc11.com/nc-absentee-ballot-vote-totals-north-carolina-early-voting-questions/7201452/\">night of the election</a>, as the state is on the east coast, whose voting centers are among the first to close. Additionally, absentee ballots in North Carolina are <a href=\"https://www.ncsbe.gov/voting/vote-mail\">validated before Election Day</a> which allows them to be counted more quickly.</li><li><strong>Ohio</strong> continues to be a difficult state for Democrats to win over post-Obama, and Trump is currently leading in the state by an <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/ohio/\">average of 0.6 percentage points</a> in the polls.</li><li>In <strong>Georgia</strong>, Biden currently leads in the polls by about 1-1.2 percentage points, according to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/georgia/\">FiveThirtyEight.</a> Conversely, <a href=\"https://www.realclearpolitics.com/epolls/2020/president/ga/georgia_trump_vs_biden-6974.html\">RealClearPolitics</a> estimates that Trump is currently leading in the state by just 0.2 points. The state has not voted for a Democratic nominee since President <a href=\"https://www.270towin.com/states/georgia\">Bill Clinton in 1992</a>.</li><li>In <strong>Iowa,</strong> an average of polls estimates Trump is in the lead by <a href=\"https://www.realclearpolitics.com/epolls/2020/president/ia/iowa_trump_vs_biden-6787.html\">up to 1.2 percentage points</a> over Biden. Trump previously beat Clinton in the state by 9.5 percentage points in 2016.</li><li>Biden is currently leading in <strong>Arizona</strong> by an average of about <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/arizona/\">2.6 percentage points</a> in the polls. Trump won the state in 2016 by 3.5 points.&#160;</li><li>Trump currently trails Biden by an <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/florida/\">average of 2.5 percentage points</a> in <strong>Florida</strong>, but the race may be even closer as <a href=\"https://www.realclearpolitics.com/epolls/2020/president/fl/florida_trump_vs_biden-6841.html\">RealClearPolitics</a> estimates Biden is up by just 1.7 percentage points.</li><li>In <strong>Pennsylvania</strong>, Biden leads Trump by an average of <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/pennsylvania/\">4.8 percentage points</a> in a state that Trump won by just <a href=\"https://www.nytimes.com/elections/2016/results/pennsylvania-president-clinton-trump\">44,292 votes</a> in 2016. The state is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/pennsylvania-is-the-most-important-state-on-the-map-now-2020-10\">a must-win</a> for Biden.</li><li>Lastly, Biden holds an average lead of 8.2 percentage points in the polls in <strong>Wisconsin</strong>, according to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/wisconsin/\">FiveThirtyEight</a>. Trump won the state in 2016 by less than one percentage point of the final vote.</li></ul><p>To win the election, a candidate must receive at least 270 electoral votes. The tipping-point state is the state which would provide the winner with the 270th electoral vote needed to win the election and is based on the victor's <a href=\"https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/pennsylvania-could-be-an-electoral-tipping-point/\">margin of victory</a>.</p><p>FiveThirtyEight also predicts that the states <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/2020-election-forecast/\">most likely to be the tipping point</a>&#160;in the presidential election are Pennsylvania, Florida, Wisconsin, Michigan, North Carolina, Minnesota, Arizona, Nevada, and Georgia.</p><h2>Which polls should I trust?</h2><p>For the highest levels of accuracy, it's best to look to independent polls conducted by third parties that use a random sample. FiveThirtyEight has a helpful tool that <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/\">aggregates national polls</a> and grades each pollster on its <a href=\"https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/how-fivethirtyeight-calculates-pollster-ratings/\">methodology</a> and historical accuracy.&#160;</p><p>Politicians and campaigns traditionally love to cite internal polls, but these polls should be approached with a <a href=\"https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/is-don-blankenship-really-surging-in-west-virginia/\">healthy amount of skepticism</a>. If an internal poll \"leaks,\" it could be done intentionally and purposefully.</p><p>With internal polls, campaigns are able to choose which questions are asked, the wording of the questions, and the order. Additionally, campaigns often neglect to release the polling methodology or the polls in their entirety. Without knowing these specifics, internal polls should not be given too much weight.</p><bi-shortcode id=\"expanded-coverage\" class=\"mceNonEditable\" data-source=\"insider-voter-guide\" 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"Fargo, North Dakota, mayor clashes with governor over whether the state should require people to wear face masks as COVID-19 cases multiply in the state","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/north-dakota-governor-refuses-statewide-mask-mandate-covid-cases-surge-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa09dde1df1d50018218780?format=jpeg\" alt=\"GettyImages Doug Burgum\" height=\"512\" width=\"1024\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>North Dakota Governor Doug Burgum.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Stephen Yang/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Several cities in North Dakota have enacted mask mandates as COVID-19 cases in the state continue to rise.&#160;</li>\n<li>The state's governor has encouraged mask use but stopped short of enacting requirements, despite calls from some mayors.&#160;</li>\n<li>North Dakota was the first state to surpass 100 cases per 100,000 residents.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>COVID-19 cases in North Dakota continue to surge and while different cities have chosen to enact face mask requirements, Gov. Doug Burgum has been hesitant to order a statewide mandate.</p><p>In October, the city of Fargo mayor Dr. Tim Mahoney enacted a <a href=\"https://download.fargond.gov/0/mayoral_mask_mandate.pdf\">citywide rule</a> instructing everyone in the city to don a mask indoors and outdoors if they are with people who are not members of their own household. While there is no punishment for ignoring that requirement, Mahoney says he said people are cooperating with the mandate.</p><p>\"We found great compliance. So what's happened is the businesses now kind of blame the mayor for saying you got to wear a mask in their business so they don't really irritate their client,\" Mahoney told Business Insider. \"It's more that, well, the mayor says you got to do it, so you gotta do it.\"</p><p>Currently, the state encourages mask usage but has stopped short of requiring it, despite North Dakota becoming the first state to surpass 100 cases per 100,000 people, <a href=\"https://www.vox.com/future-perfect/2020/10/27/21534480/north-dakota-south-dakota-covid-coronavirus-pandemic-third-wave\">according to an October 27 report from Vox</a>.&#160;</p><p>Mahoney lamented what he described as a lack of leadership in North Dakota on measures to limit the spread of the coronavirus in the state. Gov. Doug Burgum has taken a hands-off approach to face mask regulations, arguing it \"is not a magic bullet to make this virus go away,\" <a href=\"https://apnews.com/article/virus-outbreak-bismarck-doug-burgum-north-dakota-elections-0d2f470fe7a14a5ce156b6724de3bce7\">the Associated Press reported</a> in October.</p><p>Mahoney takes issue with that strategy.</p><p>\"So ... do I shut your businesses down, or do you do that? And early on the mayors pushed back and said, 'We want to have some ability to be part of the decision-making,'\" he said.&#160;</p><p>Other cities in North Dakota have since adopted rules for face masks. Mahoney said that should be a cue for leaders at the state level to act.</p><p>\"More of us feel it would be very helpful. But he's still saying it's a local decision,\" Mahoney said of the North Dakota governor.</p><p>Bergum's office did not immediately respond to Business Insider's request for comment.</p><p>Dr. Deborah Birx, a member of the White House coronavirus task force also pushed for the state to adopt a statewide policy during a visit last month, the <a href=\"https://www.duluthnewstribune.com/newsmd/coronavirus/6734268-White-House-COVID-19-doctor-clashes-with-North-Dakota-governor-on-mask-mandate\">Duluth News Tribune</a> reported.&#160;</p><p>\"There is not only an evidence that masks work,\" Birx said during her visit, \"there is an evidence that masks utilized as a public health mitigation effort work.\"</p><p>The outlet reported that Bergum has dismissed the idea and instead encouraged residents to take \"personal responsibility,\" in their individual decision making.&#160;</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read
