border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/0R1DNR0iLCE\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Tue, 03 Nov 2020 01:57:03 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fa09dd969331a0011bc6e20?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"b6badff027d64b04446be41c919177d7","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn58@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-34-280_9c0f5f2a936d3818.webp","destWidth":910,"destHeight":682,"sourceBytes":22094,"destBytes":22094,"author":"salarshani@businessinsider.com (Sarah Al-Arshani)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fa09dde1df1d50018218780?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn28@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-41-719_62d38bc1747bf504.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=0R1DNR0iLCE:hIDBSiF4JXA:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn24@2020_4/2020/11/03/05-31-48-427_b18b734881cda368.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=0R1DNR0iLCE:hIDBSiF4JXA:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn31@2020_4/2020/11/03/05-31-49-614_9c682ecbcfac70d5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=0R1DNR0iLCE:hIDBSiF4JXA:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn75@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-43-577_8d2bae907f711941.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/0R1DNR0iLCE":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn61@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-58-399_dd60dd5a83044138.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490558},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"Insider's guide to the key direct ballot propositions, initiatives, and amendments of 2020","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/guide-to-key-ballot-initiatives-propositions-in-2020-results-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa070bf91178a0019b3dc69?format=jpeg\" alt=\"California prop 22\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Rideshare drivers demonstrate against rideshare companies Uber and Lyft during a car caravan protest on August 6, 2020 in Los Angeles.\n<p class=\"copyright\">ROBYN BECK/AFP via Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Americans across the nation are voting on several consequential ballot initiatives in 2020 on everything from labor laws to drug legalization.&#160;</li>\n<li>Direct ballot initiatives, amendments, and propositions enable voters to directly change state law or their state's constitution with their vote, or to compel the legislature to take a certain action.&#160;</li>\n<li>Insider and Decision Desk HQ will have live results and calls for nearly 20 of the most important ballot initiatives in 2020.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>In addition to the hotly-contested presidential and congressional elections, Americans across the nation are voting on several consequential ballot initiatives on everything from drug legalization and decriminalization to abortion policy and election administration.&#160;</p><p>Direct ballot initiatives, amendments, and propositions enable voters to directly change state law or their state's constitution with their vote.&#160;</p><p>The most high-profile ballot proposition of 2020 is California's Prop 22, in which voters will determine whether to uphold or reverse a controversial law, Assembly Bill 5, which prohibited ride-share companies like Uber and Lyft from classifying employees as independent contractors.&#160;</p><p>Insider and our partners at Decision Desk HQ will have live, updated results and calls for nearly 20 of the most important ballot initiatives and questions in 2020.&#160;</p><h3>Find the live results for the most key 2020 ballot initiatives and referendums here:&#160;</h3><ul><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/puerto-rico-statehood-referendum-live-results-2020\">Puerto Rico Statehood referendum</a>:</strong> Residents of the US territory of Puerto Rico will be voting on a non-binding referendum on whether the territory should seek to become a US state. While Puerto Ricans are currently US citizens, pay taxes, and can serve in the military, they cannot vote in federal elections and do not have voting representation in Congress.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/alaska-ballot-measure-2-live-vote-count-results-2020\">Alaska Ballot Measure 2:</a> </strong>Alaskans are voting on an initiative that would replace the state's current partisan primary system with non-partisan, top-four primaries and enact ranked-choice voting.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/arizona-proposition-207-live-vote-count-results-marijuana-2020\">Arizona Proposition 207:</a></strong> Arizona is voting on whether to legalize and regulate recreational marijuana use for adults 21 and older and to tax marijuana sales.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/california-proposition-17-parolee-voting-rights-2020\">California Proposition 17:</a> </strong>This measure would extend the right to vote to Californians serving parole. California is currently one of just three states that allow citizens on probation but not parole to vote.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/california-proposition-18-17-year-old-vote-live-results-2020-10\">California Proposition 18:</a>&#160;</strong>A measure to allow 17-year-olds who will turn 18 by the time of the general or regular election to vote in primaries and special elections.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/california-proposition-20-sentencing-reform-rollback-results-2020\">California Proposition 20:</a> </strong>This proposition would roll back some criminal justice and sentencing reforms enacted over the past decade, including restoring restrictions on parole and allowing prosecutors to prosecute some misdemeanor theft cases as felonies.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/california-proposition-22-live-vote-count-results-2020\">California Proposition 22:&#160;</a></strong>A hotly-debated and contested initiative that, if passed, would allow rideshare companies like Uber and Lyft to classify all employees as independent contractors and not full-time employees. The measure would overturn the highly controversial Assembly Bill 5.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/california-proposition-25-to-eliminate-or-keep-cash-bail-live-results-2020\">California Proposition 25:</a> </strong>In this proposition, Californians will vote on whether the state will be the first in the nation to eliminate the use of cash bail in courts statewide.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/colorado-proposition-113-national-popular-vote-compact-results-2020\">Colorado Proposition 113:</a> </strong>Colorado is voting on whether the state and its nine electoral college votes should enter the National Popular Vote Compact, in which member states pledge all their Electoral College votes to the winner of the national popular vote.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/colorado-proposition-115-to-enact-a-22-week-abortion-ban-2020\"><strong>Colorado Proposition 115:</strong>&#160;</a>&#160;A measure that would prohibit abortion after 22 weeks of pregnancy, except in circumstances where necessary to save the pregnant person's life.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/washington-dc-initiative-81-to-decriminalize-shrooms-live-results-2020-10\">District of Columbia Initiative 81:</a> </strong>A ballot initiative that would decriminalize the use of psychedelic and hallucinogenic mushrooms.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/florida-amendment-3-to-create-top-two-primaries-live-results-counts-2020\">Florida Amendment 3:</a>&#160;</strong>This measure would enact a top-two, or jungle, primary system for gubernatorial, cabinet, and state legislative elections and allow non-affiliated voters to vote in such primaries. It requires a 60% threshold to pass.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/louisiana-amendment-1-on-abortion-results-2020\">Louisiana Amendment 1:</a></strong> This amendment, if passed, would explicitly guarantee no right to an abortion or to public funding for abortions under Louisiana's constitution.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/massachusetts-ballot-question-2-ranked-choice-voting-live-results-2020-10\"><strong>Massachusetts Question 2:&#160;</strong></a>A measure that would enact ranked-choice voting for federal and state-level elections starting in 2022.&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/montana-i-190-ci-118-marijuana-propositions-live-vote-count-results-2020\"><strong>Montana I-190 and C1-118:</strong> </a>Montana is voting on ballot initiatives to legalize the use of recreational marijuana for adults 21 and over, tax marijuana products, and allow the legislature to set the legal age for marijuana purchase.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/new-jersey-public-question-1-live-vote-count-results-2020\">New Jersey Public Question 1:</a> </strong>A measure to regulate the possession, use, and purchasing of recreational marijuana for adults aged 21 and older.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/oregon-measure-109-live-vote-count-results-2020\">Oregon Measure 109:</a> </strong>This initiative would legalize the use of psilocybin drugs like mushrooms in certain regulated medical settings to patients 21 and older. Some studies indicate that the use of such drugs, when overseen by a physician, can be effective in treating mental health conditions like depression, post-traumatic stress disorder, and anxiety.&#160;</li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/oregon-measure-110-live-vote-count-results-2020\">Oregon Measure 110:</a> </strong>An initiative to decriminalize the possession of certain controlled substances, including cocaine, heroin, and methamphetamine. It would also direct some revenue from recreational marijuana sales to funding drug addiction treatment programs.&#160;&#160;</li><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/south-dakota-constitutional-amendment-live-vote-count-results-2020\"><strong>South Dakota Constitutional Amendment A:</strong></a> An initiative that would legalize the use of recreational marijuana and mandate the state legislature to pass bills legalizing medical marijuana and the sale of hemp.&#160;</li></ul><h3>You can find live election results from Insider and Decision Desk HQ <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-election-results\">for the presidential race</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-senate-election-results\">the US Senate</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-house-elections-results\">the US House of Representatives</a> here.&#160;</h3><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a Panetta)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fa070bf91178a0019b3dc69?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn87@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-40-296_0e49b2fbe8f59650.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OVOhN5ZLgqg:CEz4AK3AaZE:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn7@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-53-668_88cec0e53990374a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OVOhN5ZLgqg:CEz4AK3AaZE:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn81@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-59-000_2e89bbc11789bd0f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=OVOhN5ZLgqg:CEz4AK3AaZE:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn88@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-47-121_f502cb5149b47e58.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/OVOhN5ZLgqg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn40@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-49-852_6a507df466ae7b00.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490564},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"Insider's guide to the 2020 gubernatorial elections","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/guide-to-2020-gubernatorial-elections-explainers-live-results-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f3f097842f43f001ddfe368?format=jpeg\" alt=\"RoyCooper-DanForest\" height=\"1267\" width=\"2535\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>North Carolina Gov. Roy Cooper/Lt. Gov. Dan Forest.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Ethan Hyman/Raleigh News &#38; Observer/Tribune News Service via Getty Images/Gerry Broome/AP Photo</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Eleven gubernatorial seats are up for grabs around the US in 2020.</li>\n<li>While gubernatorial elections have been largely overshadowed by the presidential race, governors have played in a leading role in shaping the US' response to the COVID-19 pandemic.&#160;</li>\n<li>Insider, in partnership with Decision Desk HQ, will have live election results and race calls for all 11 gubernatorial elections on the ballot.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>In addition to the closely watched race between President Donald Trump and Democratic nominee Joe Biden, there are 11 gubernatorial elections taking place around the country.</p><p>The races for governor haven't received much attention in the 2020 cycle, with the race for the presidency and the US Senate taking center stage.&#160;</p><p>But especially given the lack of a coordinated national response to the COVID-19 pandemic, governors have taken on an outsize role and emerged as key players in shaping the trajectory of the pandemic in their states, on everything from stay-at-home orders to mask mandates and school reopenings to safety measures for businesses.&#160;</p><p>This year, governors have used their own executive authority in addition to working with their state legislatures and fellow governors to enact consequential policies in response to the virus, highlighting the importance of those offices.&#160;</p><p>Insider in partnership with Decision Desk HQ will have live election results and race calls for all 11 gubernatorial elections on the ballot.&#160;</p><ul><li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/montana-governors-race-mike-cooney-greg-gianforte-2020\"><strong>Montana</strong>:</a> Democratic Lt. Gov. Mike Cooney and Republican Greg Gianforte, who currently represents Montana's at-large congressional district, are facing off in the open race to replace outgoing Gov. Steve Bullock. This competitive race is rated a tossup by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a> and leans Republican by <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.&#160;</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/roy-cooper-vs-dan-forest-north-carolina-governor-election-2020\">North Carolina:</a> </strong>Democratic Gov. Roy Cooper is seeking a second term against Republican Lt. Gov Dan Forest, in one of the most highly-watched races in this key battleground state, with Cooper well-positioned to win. The race is rated \"likely Democratic\" by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and&#160;<a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-mike-parson-vs-nicole-galloway-missouri-governor-election-2020\">Missouri:</a>&#160;</strong>Republican Gov. Mike Parson is facing a challenge from Democratic State Auditor Nicole Galloway, who has run a formidable campaign and attracted significant fundraising, putting the governorship of this deep-red state in play. The race is rated \"leans Republican\" <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">by the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-chris-sununu-vs-dan-feltes-new-hampshire-governor-2020\">New Hampshire:</a> </strong>Republican Gov. Chris Sununu is seeking another term and facing Democratic State Senator Dan Feltes. This race is rated as solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a> and likely Republican by <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-phil-scott-vs-david-zuckerman-vermont-governor-election-2020\">Vermont:</a> </strong>Republican Gov. Phil Scott is running against Democratic Lt. Gov David Zuckerman. This race is rated safe/solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-john-carney-julianne-murray-delaware-election-governor-2020\">Delaware:</a> </strong>Democratic Gov. John Carney is running for a second term against Republican Julianne Murray.&#160; This race is rated safe/solid Democratic by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-jay-inslee-loren-culp-washington-governor-election-2020\">Washington:</a> </strong>Democratic Governor and former 2020 presidential candidate Jay Inslee is running for a third term against Republican Loren Culp. This race is rated safe/solid Democratic by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-eric-holcomb-woody-myers-indiana-governor-election-2020\">Indiana:</a> </strong>Republican Gov. Eric Holcomb, who succeeded Vice President Mike Pence in Indiana's governor's office, is expected to easily win another term against Democrat Woody Myers. This race is rated safe/solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-spencer-cox-christopher-peterson-utah-governor-election-2020\">Utah:</a> </strong>Republican Lt. Gov. Spencer Cox is facing off against Democratic nominee Christopher Peterson in the open race for Utah's governorship. This race is rated safe/solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-doug-burgum-shelley-lenz-north-dakota-governor-election-2020\">North Dakota:</a> </strong>Republican Gov. Doug Burgum is running for another term against Democratic candidate Dr. Shelley Lenz. This race is rated safe/solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/live-results-jim-justice-ben-salango-west-virginia-governor-election-2020\">West Virginia:</a> </strong>Republican Gov. Jim Justice, who has initially elected as a Democrat in 2016 but almost immediately switched parties to become a Republican in 2017, is running for a second term against Democratic Ben Salango.&#160;This race is rated solid Republican by <a href=\"https://cookpolitical.com/ratings/governor-race-ratings\">the Cook Political Report</a> and likely Republican by <a href=\"https://centerforpolitics.org/crystalball/2020-governor/\">Sabato's Crystal Ball.</a></li></ul><h3>You can find live election results from Insider and Decision Desk HQ <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-election-results\">for the presidential race</a>, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-senate-election-results\">the US Senate</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/2020-house-elections-results\">the US House of Representatives</a> here.&#160;</h3><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/guide-to-2020-gubernatorial-elections-explainers-live-results-2020-11'>Business Insider</a></div><div class=\"feedflare\">\n<a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=uaha4IYROpU:ANNU2gbxIMw:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/uaha4IYROpU\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 02 Nov 2020 22:58:21 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f3f096e89aff80028ab7097?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"6ea35a4505b38ed798baf87652170fc4","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn41@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-34-226_6e8313dda56227b3.webp","destWidth":2133,"destHeight":1600,"sourceBytes":121458,"destBytes":121458,"author":"gpanetta@businessinsider.com (Grace Panetta)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f3f097842f43f001ddfe368?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn40@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-58-752_5f3b3ea14c2f12d6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=uaha4IYROpU:ANNU2gbxIMw:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn65@2020_6/2020/11/03/05-31-56-872_a255967c0088e570.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=uaha4IYROpU:ANNU2gbxIMw:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn92@2020_3/2020/11/03/05-31-47-092_41e246e1aa698217.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=uaha4IYROpU:ANNU2gbxIMw:gIN9vFwOqvQ":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/uaha4IYROpU":null},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490557},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"An hour-by-hour guide to Election Night and when to expect results in the days and weeks following","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/hour-by-hour-guide-election-night-when-expect-results-november-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f5fb81157b7da001ee117a5?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Trump Biden\" height=\"1280\" width=\"2560\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Jim Watson/AFP via Getty Images; Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>With a massive surge in mail-in voting, it's likely we won't know which presidential candidate won many states, including key battlegrounds, on election night.</li>\n<li>Here's a guide to what you should watch for on election night and in the days and weeks following.&#160;</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>With a massive surge in mail-in voting, it's likely we won't know which presidential candidate won many states, including key battlegrounds, on election night.</p><p>Despite President Donald Trump's <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/trump-hopes-states-wont-allowed-count-ballots-after-election-day-2020-10\">false claim</a> that ballots shouldn't be counted after Election Day, it's normal and perfectly legal for states to continue counting, and in some cases, accepting ballots after Election Day (as long as they were postmarked by Nov. 3).&#160;</p><p>We won't have full results in the crucial swing states Michigan and Pennsylvania until a few days after Election Day. While purple states like Arizona, North Carolina, and Florida expect to have most of their results reported on Tuesday night, mail-in ballots cast shortly before Election Day may not be reported until later in the week. Close races in these states could delay the outcome of the presidential and key Senate races.&#160;</p><p>Because Trump has aggressively attacked mail-in voting, we're expecting that a handful of states will experience a so-called \"red mirage\" showing it leaning towards Republicans and then shifting towards Democrats as disproportionately blue mail-in ballots are counted. Blue mirages could occur in Florida, Arizona, and North Carolina, which will release their mail-in ballot results earlier.&#160;</p><h2>An hour-by-hour guide to election night</h2><ul><li><strong>6 p.m. ET: </strong>Polls close in Kentucky and Indiana</li><li><strong>7 p.m. ET</strong>: Polls close in Georgia, South Carolina, Vermont, and Virginia&#160;</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong>Keep your eyes on Georgia. Biden leads Trump in the red state by about 1.3 points, according to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/georgia/\">FiveThirtyEight's polling average</a>. If Georgia is close or Biden is ahead on election night, that's bad news for Trump.&#160;</p><p>Biden is leading in Virginia by 11.2 points, according to the <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/virginia/\">polling average</a>.&#160;</p><p><strong>Senate races:&#160;</strong>Both of <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/rev-raphael-warnock-jon-ossof-interview-about-georgias-changing-electorate-2020-10\">Georgia's Senate seats</a> are up for grabs. Republican Sen. David Perdue <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/georgia-senate-race-david-perdue-vs-jon-ossoff-polls-fundraising-2020-8\">is facing a tough challenge</a> from Democrat Jon Ossoff while GOP Sen. Kelly Loeffler, who was appointed last year, is <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/kelly-loeffler-vs-doug-collins-georgia-senate-election-polls-fundraising-2020-8\">running in a tight special election</a> that could go to a January runoff.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>7:30 p.m. ET</strong>: Polls close in North Carolina, Ohio, and West Virginia</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong>Trump won all three of these states in 2016, but has just a 0.8 point lead in Ohio, according to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/ohio/\">FiveThirtyEight's average</a>, and is trailing Biden by <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/north-carolina/\">1.9 points in North Carolina</a>. If Trump is underperforming in either state on election night that's a bad sign for him.&#160;</p><p><strong>Senate race: </strong>Sen. Thom Tillis, a North Carolina Republican, is facing a competitive challenge from Democrat Cal Cunningham.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>8 p.m. ET</strong>: Polls close in Alabama, Connecticut, Washington, DC, Delaware, Florida, Kansas, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, Michigan, Mississippi, Missouri, New Jersey, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Tennessee, Texas</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong>Biden is leading Trump by 2.3 points in Florida, a must-win state for Trump. Florida is expected to release most of its results on Tuesday night. Pennsylvania is also a pivotal state, but results likely won't be known until later in the week.&#160;</p><p><strong>Senate race: </strong>Sen. Susan Collins, a Maine Republican, is in a very tight race against Democratic challenger and Maine House Speaker Sara Gideon.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>8:30 p.m. ET</strong>: Polls close in Arkansas</li><li><strong>9 p.m. ET</strong>: Arizona, Colorado, Kansas, Louisiana, Michigan, Minnesota, Nebraska, New Mexico, New York, North Dakota, South Dakota, Texas, Wisconsin, Wyoming</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong> Biden is leading in Arizona, a state Trump won in 2016, by 2.6 points, according to <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/arizona/\">FiveThirtyEight's average.</a></p><p>Michigan, which is expected to take a few days after Election Day to report full results, is a key battleground Trump barely won in 2016. Biden is leading by 8 points in the polls going into Election Day.</p><p>Trump also barely won Wisconsin in 2016, and Biden has a similar 8-point lead in the polls. State officials expect to report Wisconsin's full results by late Tuesday night or early Wednesday morning.&#160;</p><p>The president is <a href=\"https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/texas/\">ahead in Texas by just one point</a> and if Biden is competitive here, that's bad news for Trump. If the president loses Texas, it's all over for him.&#160;</p><p><strong>Senate races: </strong>Sen. Martha McSally, an Arizona Republican, is trailing Democrat Mark Kelly, a retired astronaut, and husband to former Rep. Gabby Giffords, in the polls. And in Colorado, Republican Sen. Cory Gardner is facing a tough challenge from former Gov. John Hickenlooper.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>10 p.m. ET: </strong>Iowa, Montana, Nevada, Utah</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong>Biden has a 4.9-point lead over Trump in Nevada, which Trump lost by just over two points in 2016. Holding Nevada will be important for Biden.&#160; &#160;</p><p>Trump is just 1.4 points ahead of Biden in Iowa polls and a loss here would be a bad sign for Trump, who won Iowa by more than nine points in 2016.&#160;</p><p><strong>Senate races: </strong>Republican Sen. Joni Ernst of Iowa is just four points ahead of her Democratic challenger, Theresa Greenfield, according to <a href=\"https://www.desmoinesregister.com/story/news/politics/iowa-poll/2020/10/31/election-2020-iowa-poll-greenfield-ernst-us-senate-race-voters/6055545002/\">recent polling</a>. Sen. Steve Daines, a Montana Republican, is locked in a tight race with two-term Democratic Gov. Steve Bullock.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>11 p.m. ET</strong>: California, Idaho, Oregon, Washington</li></ul><p><strong>Presidential race: </strong>If Biden sweeps on Election Day, the blue West Coast states could put him over the edge towards the end of the night.&#160;</p><ul><li><strong>12 a.m. ET</strong>: Polls close in Hawaii&#160;</li><li><strong>1 a.m. ET (Nov. 4)</strong>: Polls close in Alaska</li></ul><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa0512969331a0011bc6c58?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Florida voters Miami-Dade\" height=\"1000\" width=\"2000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>MIAMI, FLORIDA - AUGUST 11: Poll workers help a voter put their mail-in ballot in an official Miami-Dade County ballot drop box on August 11, 2020 in Miami, Florida. The secure drop boxes at polling stations allow voters to drop off the state’s Primary Election Vote-By-Mail ballots and skip any voting lines as people try to vote and stay healthy during the coronavirus pandemic. The ballot drop box is also a way to securely deliver a voting ballot to the polling station and not have to mail the Vote-By-Mail ballot through the U.S. Postal Service.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Photo by Joe Raedle/Getty Images</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><h2>Expected timing of unofficial results in every state</h2><p>Most states will report their unofficial results by late Tuesday night. But many other states, including some key battlegrounds, are expected to take a few days or weeks to report out their final counts.&#160;</p><p>Here's a guide to when each state is likely to report their results:</p><p><strong>Nov. 3:&#160;</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Alabama</strong>: We'll <a href=\"https://www.aldailynews.com/merrill-says-election-results-will-be-known-by-election-night-in-alabama/\">likely know</a> which way this deep red state will go early on election night, since mail-in and in-person ballots are counted at the same time.</li><li><strong>Arizona</strong>: We should have preliminary results (early, mail-in, and in-person ballots) in this swing state at around 10 p.m. But mail-in ballots that arrive on Monday and Tuesday won't be counted until the <a href=\"https://www.phoenixnewtimes.com/news/arizona-election-day-adrian-fontes-voting-answers-polling-centers-11499710\">end of the week</a>.</li><li><strong>Arkansas</strong>: We should know Arkansas' projected outcome pretty early on election night. The deep red state will release early and mail-in votes first.</li><li><strong>Colorado</strong>: Most Colorado ballots are mail-in, and they all must be received by Election Day, so this blue state is expected to report <a href=\"https://www.denverpost.com/2020/10/30/election-results-colorado-denver-2020/\">the vast majority of its ballots</a> on election night. Mail-in ballots received shortly before and on Nov. 3 will likely be reported shortly after Election Day.</li><li><strong>Delaware</strong>: This deep blue state will report its results, including all mail-in votes, on election night.&#160;&#160;</li><li><strong>Florida:</strong> This swing state allows election officials to process mail-in ballots before Election Day, so most of Florida's results will be reported Tuesday night. But some counties might continue counting ballots into Wednesday and potentially Thursday.&#160;</li><li><strong>Georgia:&#160;</strong>This swing state will report most of its results on election night, but results in some tight races might not be clear until Wednesday or Thursday.&#160;</li><li><strong>Hawaii</strong>: This deep blue state will report its results shortly after polls close at 12 am ET.&#160;</li><li><strong>Idaho</strong>: This deep red state should have most of its results in by 12 am on election night.</li><li><strong>Iowa: </strong>This battleground state <a href=\"https://dailyiowan.com/2020/10/06/iowa-election-officials-hopeful-for-quick-results-on-election-night/\">expects</a> to have its most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Kansas: </strong>This red state expects to have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Kentucky</strong>: This solidly red state expects to have <a href=\"https://spectrumnews1.com/ky/lexington/news/2020/10/20/october-absentee-voting-update\">up to 90%</a> of its ballots counted on election night.</li><li><strong>Louisiana: </strong>This deep red state will <a href=\"https://www.thenewsstar.com/story/news/2020/11/02/louisianas-election-day-results-delayed-mail-balllots/6120752002/\">likely</a> have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Maine</strong>: This blue state will <a href=\"https://www.sunjournal.com/2020/10/23/maine-town-and-city-clerks-optimistic-for-timely-election-night-results/\">likely</a> have its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Massachusetts: </strong>This deep blue state will <a href=\"https://www.nbcboston.com/news/local/what-to-expect-on-election-night-in-massachusetts/2219119/\">likely</a> have its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Minnesota</strong>: This battleground state <a href=\"https://minnesotareformer.com/2020/09/21/some-states-wont-start-counting-votes-until-election-night-including-minnesota/\">expects</a> to have its most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Mississippi</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://www.wtok.com/2020/10/05/secretary-of-state-releases-mississippis-absentee-ballot-count-so-far/\">expects</a> to have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Missouri</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://www.newstribune.com/news/local/story/2020/oct/25/mid-missouri-county-clerks-no-delays-expected-election-night/846605/\">expects</a> to have nearly all of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Montana</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://apnews.com/article/election-2020-virus-outbreak-general-elections-elections-montana-633d6c12d2717c3a133e503bb9f8d758\">expects</a> to have nearly all of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Nebraska</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://www.3newsnow.com/news/investigations/how-late-is-too-late-to-mail-your-ballot\">expects</a> to have nearly all of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>New Hampshire</strong>: This swing state <a href=\"https://www.concordmonitor.com/Election-2020-Will-NH-know-the-results-on-election-night-State-official-expert-say-yes-36986800\">should</a> have its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>New Mexico</strong>: This blue state <a href=\"https://nmpoliticalreport.com/2020/09/21/secretary-of-state-talks-voting-by-mail-in-new-mexico/\">expects</a> to have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>North Carolina</strong>: This battleground state expects to have up to 80% of its results <a href=\"https://twitter.com/JoeBrunoWSOC9/status/1318639589511335937?s=20\">reported</a> on election night, but it might take days to call tight races as the state continues to count mail-in ballots.&#160;</li><li><strong>North Dakota</strong>: This red state will <a href=\"https://www.kxnet.com/news/local-news/gov-burgum-signs-executive-order-to-ensure-election-integrity-timely-results-for-absentee-ballots/\">likely</a> have its most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Ohio: </strong>This battleground state will have most of its results in on election night, but will <a href=\"https://abc6onyourside.com/news/local/ohio-secretary-of-state-announces-post-election-results-schedule\">continue</a> to count mail-in ballots until its deadline on Nov. 13.</li><li><strong>Oklahoma</strong>: This deep red state expects to have nearly all of its results reported on election night.</li><li><strong>Oregon</strong>: This blue state typically votes by mail, so <a href=\"https://www.registerguard.com/story/news/politics/elections/2020/11/02/oregons-vote-mail-process-could-mean-fast-election-night-results/6099249002/\">it should</a> have its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Rhode Island</strong>: The solidly blue state will <a href=\"https://www.providencejournal.com/story/news/2020/10/26/ri-begin-releasing-mail-ballot-results-election-night/6040416002/\">likely</a> have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>South Carolina</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://www.wistv.com/2020/10/28/south-carolina-should-know-by-election-night-or-next-day-results-races/\">expects</a> to have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>South Dakota</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://mitchellnow.com/news/236632-sd-secretary-of-state-hopeful-that-state-results-will-be-totaled-on-election-night/\">expects</a> to have most of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Tennessee</strong>: This red state <a href=\"https://www.knoxnews.com/story/news/politics/2020/10/30/tn-official-says-trust-2020-voting-process-election-results/6084220002/\">expects</a> to have nearly all of its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Texas</strong>: This battleground state will likely report most of its results on election night, as the state has <a href=\"https://www.texastribune.org/2020/11/02/texas-count-votes/\">already been</a> processing mail-in ballots.</li><li><strong>Vermont</strong>: This blue state will <a href=\"https://www.timesargus.com/news/local/condos-no-delay-expected-for-unofficial-election-results/article_48012ca6-c5cc-51e5-abd6-80d5768703b0.html\">likely</a> have its results in on election night.</li><li><strong>Virginia</strong>: This likely blue state expects to have most of its results reported on election night.</li><li><strong>West Virginia</strong>: This red state will have most of its results reported on election night.</li><li><strong>Wyoming</strong>: This deep red state expects to have nearly all of its results reported on election night.</li></ul><p><strong>Nov. 4:&#160;</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Wisconsin</strong>: This battleground state <a href=\"https://pbswisconsin.org/news-item/evers-calls-for-gop-legislative-action-on-covid/\">expects</a> to have its results in by election night or Wednesday morning at the latest.</li></ul><p><strong>Nov. 5:&#160;</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Connecticut:&#160;</strong>It's unclear when this blue state will finish counting ballots (some parts of the state could take up to six days), but we'll likely have most results on Wednesday.&#160;&#160;</li><li><strong>Indiana: </strong>This red state will <a href=\"https://www.nbcchicago.com/news/local/indianas-1-5m-plus-early-votes-expected-to-delay-results/2362272/\">probably</a> have its results ready on Wednesday or Thursday.&#160;</li></ul><p><strong>Nov. 6:&#160;</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Michigan: </strong>This battleground state <a href=\"https://www.michigan.gov/sos/0,4670,7-127--543761--,00.html\">will likely take a few days</a> until its complete results are in. Officials start counting mail-in ballots on Monday, meaning there won't be enough time to tally them all by election night.</li><li><strong>Pennsylvania</strong>: This battleground state <a href=\"https://www.inquirer.com/politics/election/spl/pa-kathy-boockvar-precanvassing-republicans-gov-tom-wolf-20201019.html\">expects</a> to have most of its results on election night, though not all, as much of the state has voted by mail and election offices cannot start counting until Election Day.</li></ul><p><strong>Mid- to late-November:&#160;</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Alaska:&#160;</strong>We'll likely have a projected outcome for this red state on election night, but Alaska won't finish counting its mail-in ballots until up to two weeks after Election Day.&#160;</li><li><strong>California:&#160;</strong>This blue state will almost certainly go for Biden, but California accepts mail-in ballots postmarked on or before Election Day up until Nov. 20, so final results <a href=\"https://www.latimes.com/politics/story/2020-03-02/super-tuesday-election-results-timing-california\">may not be known</a> until weeks after the election.&#160;</li><li><strong>Washington, DC</strong>: It's <a href=\"https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/virginia-politics/virginia-maryland-dc-election-results-expected/2020/10/16/9857613c-0ca6-11eb-8a35-237ef1eb2ef7_story.html\">unclear</a> when deeply Democratic DC will report its full results, but it could take a few weeks. This year, DC sent mail-in ballots to every registered voter and will count ballots that arrive by Nov. 13 if they're postmarked by Election Day.&#160;</li><li><strong>Illinois</strong>: This solidly blue state will have some of its results in on election night, but votes will continue to be counted for weeks due to the state's Nov. 17 deadline for mail-in ballots.</li><li><strong>Maryland: </strong>This solidly blue state will have <a href=\"https://elections.maryland.gov/press_room/documents/Counting%20Schedule_Ballot%20Updates.pdf\">some</a> of its results in on election night, but votes will continue to be counted due to the state's Nov. 13 deadline for mail-in ballots.</li><li><strong>Nevada</strong>: This likely blue state <a href=\"https://lasvegassun.com/news/2020/sep/23/when-mail-ballots-will-be-counted-for-general-elec/\">expects</a> to have some of its results in on election night, but votes will continue to be counted due to the state's Nov. 10 deadline for mail-in ballots.</li><li><strong>New Jersey</strong>: This solidly blue state expects to take weeks to report its results. The deadline to receive mail-in ballots is Nov. 10, the same day <a href=\"https://www.nj.com/politics/2020/10/if-you-vote-in-person-on-election-day-your-vote-probably-wont-be-counted-until-nov-10-heres-why.html\">they plan</a> to start counting in-person votes.</li><li><strong>New York</strong>: This deep blue state expects to have its results from in-person votes reported by election night, but mail-in ballots will continue to be counted for days, starting on Nov. 6.</li><li><strong>Utah</strong>: This red state typically takes a while to report its results, and the <a href=\"https://www.sltrib.com/news/politics/2020/10/12/utah-ballots-arrive/\">last date</a> to receive a mail-in ballot is Nov. 17.</li><li><strong>Washington</strong>: This blue state typically votes by mail, so should have some of its results in on election night, but <a href=\"https://www.king5.com/article/news/politics/elections/it-could-take-weeks-to-finalize-elections-results/281-1069ef70-24f0-4cd5-ac0f-0ffc1bf04420\">allows ballots </a>to be counted until Nov. 23.</li></ul><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href='https://www.businessinsider.com/hour-by-hour-guide-election-night-when-expect-results-november-2020-11'>Business +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5f9889ec69331a0011bc5973?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"0b101ea1e09da6b67c89e60d07f11365","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn40@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-35-498_f6b41f598551d699.webp","destWidth":2246,"destHeight":1684,"sourceBytes":145602,"destBytes":145602,"author":"insider@insider.com (Eliza Relman,Oma Seddiq)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5f5fb81157b7da001ee117a5?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn69@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-37-147_42322b7455199d27.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fa0512969331a0011bc6c58?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn78@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-54-191_e631d29ddf07b1f6.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx31/cdn37@2020_1/2020/11/03/05-31-55-293_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=DGlFgM8yS6I:E6PDBI3NP18:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn46@2020_2/2020/11/03/05-31-58-109_d6888d41c42d8d55.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=DGlFgM8yS6I:E6PDBI3NP18:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn33@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-52-223_aa01f35045ea324f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":null,"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=DGlFgM8yS6I:E6PDBI3NP18:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn12@2020_5/2020/11/03/05-31-39-789_b6ac33039d5869d5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/DGlFgM8yS6I":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn95@2020_4/2020/11/03/05-31-47-216_e2cea4116d314113.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1604381490486},{"createdTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","updatedTime":"2020-11-03 13:31:30","title":"The space station is showing its age after housing people for 20 years. Companies are already designing new space habitats to take its place.","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/space-station-getting-old-companies-making-new-versions-2020-11","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa0934169331a0011bc6e0d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"international space station, iss\" height=\"686\" width=\"915\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The International Space Station.\n<p class=\"copyright\">NASA</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>Monday marked the 20th anniversary of continuous human presence on the International Space Station.</li>\n<li>During that time, the station has hosted over 240 crew members and 3,000 science experiments.</li>\n<li>But the space station is getting old and may be retired in the next 10 years.</li>\n<li>Private companies are developing new orbiting space habitats that could be roomier.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>On Monday, the world celebrated 20 years of continuous human presence in space. Astronauts and cosmonauts have lived aboard the International Space Station without a break since November 2, 2000.</p><p>Over those 7,300 days, the $150 billion orbiting laboratory has hosted 241 people from 19 countries, and <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/space-travel-effects-human-body-nasa-2017-2\">more than 3,000 scientific experiments</a> have been conducted there.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d951d4de28ccd163a5e947c?format=jpeg\" alt=\"International Space Station astronauts\" height=\"1402\" width=\"2100\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The crew of the International Space Station usually consists of six people at most.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"http://www.esa.int/spaceinimages/Images/2019/09/European_Day_of_Languages\" target=\"_blank\">ESA/NASA</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Still, all good things must come to an end. NASA has cleared ISS to fly <a href=\"https://www.space.com/how-to-destroy-a-space-station-safely\">until at least 2028</a>, but the station is starting to show its age. At some point in the next 10 to 15 years, it's likely that NASA will deorbit the station, crashing it <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/spacecraft-cemetery-point-nemo-google-maps-2017-10\">into the southern Pacific Ocean</a>.</p><p>But other habitable stations are expected to take its place — most of them designed and built by private companies.&#160;</p><p>Some of these companies, like Axiom Space and Bigelow Aerospace, hope to build on the ISS's success by adding extensions to the station that could eventually be removed to orbit as their own habitats. Others, like Blue Origin, want to build brand-new space accommodations so large and sophisticated that they could start to resemble life on Earth.&#160;</p><h2>The ISS is getting old</h2><p>The station has already outlived its life expectancy of <a href=\"https://www.nasa.gov/missions/highlights/webcasts/shuttle/sts110/iss-qa.html#:~:text=V%20Well%2C%20on%20paper%20the,Fifteen%20times%20two%20is%2030.\">15 years</a>. In the last few months alone, the station's Russian side has seen<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/astronauts-cosmonauts-found-space-station-leak-using-tea-leaves-2020-10\"> a toilet go bust, an oxygen-supply system break down, and an air leak grow larger</a>.</p><p>\"All modules of the Russian segment are exhausted,\" Gennady Padalka, a cosmonaut,<a href=\"https://ria.ru/20201015/kosmos-1579901308.html\"> told RIA Novosti in October.</a>&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f6ce89d0f4d550011032298?format=jpeg\" alt=\"ISS zvezda\" height=\"506\" width=\"900\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>A diagram of the International Space Station, including the Zvezda Service Module.\n<p class=\"copyright\">NASA</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>These issues aren't enough to compromise the station's integrity for now, but are warning signs of deterioration.</p><p>\"I think it's an incredibly reliable and a robust system,\" Kate Rubins, a NASA astronaut currently on the ISS, said during a press call last month.&#160;</p><p>But the prospect of the space station's looming retirement already has private companies competing to develop worthy successors.&#160;</p><h2><strong>Some companies will start by building attachments to the ISS</strong></h2><p>Axiom Space, a private aerospace company based in Houston, Texas, <a href=\"https://www.axiomspace.com/overview-and-team\">aims to build the first commercial space station</a>. Founded in 2016,&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/axiom-space-private-astronaut-mission-agreement-2020-3\">Axiom</a> has already <a href=\"https://www.nasa.gov/press-release/nasa-selects-first-commercial-destination-module-for-international-space-station\">received a contract from NASA</a> to build at least one new livable commercial module to add to the existing space station. Then once the ISS retires, that module, along with any others that Axiom has added in the intervening years, would theoretically detach to become an independent orbital outpost.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5f63df9c57b7da001ee12606?format=jpeg\" alt=\"axiom module 2\" height=\"1060\" width=\"1885\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>An artist&#39;s rendering of Axiom&#39;s Earth Observatory, a section within its planned International Space Station module.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Axiom Space</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Another company with similar aspirations is Bigelow Aerospace, which was founded by real estate billionaire Robert Bigelow in 1999. The business has already sent a working prototype of its inflatable ISS module to space — the Bigelow Expandable Activity Module, or BEAM, has been <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/bigelow-aerospace-mars-transporter-inside-interior-pictures-photos-2019-9#so-far-the-company-has-an-impressive-track-record-it-has-launched-several-working-prototypes-into-space-the-latest-of-which-is-the-bigelow-expandable-activity-module-or-beam-which-is-attached-to-the-international-space-station-4\">attached to the station</a> since 2016. It's currently used for storage.</p><p>But Bigelow is designing a new version of the habitat at its facilities in Las Vegas, Nevada, that is far bigger and more ambitious than the first. The latest model, called the B330, has 11,650 cubic feet of internal volume (330 cubic meters, hence its name. That's <a href=\"https://www.thecalculatorsite.com/conversions/common/square-feet-cubic-feet.php\">roughly the size</a> of an 1,165-square-foot apartment with 10-foot ceilings.&#160;</p><p>\"Equipped with two galleys, two toilets, enormous cargo space, and two dissimilar propulsion systems, this is the ideal habitat for a long-duration space mission,\" Bigelow <a href=\"http://bigelowaerospace.com/pages/news/learnmore.php?story=b330_mars\">said in a statement in September 2019</a>. \"This large space station can accommodate four people indefinitely and five people for many months.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5d7ac66e2e22af0b746a1194?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Bigelow space pod\" height=\"2026\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>NASA astronauts kneel inside a prototype of Bigelow Aerospace&#39;s space station module.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bigelow Aerospace via Imgur</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>Eventually, Bigelow hopes some version of the B330 could house astronauts journeying to Mars.&#160;</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa090c41df1d5001821876d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"sierra nevada inflatable gateway habitat\" height=\"354\" width=\"630\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Sierra Nevada&#39;s inflatable space-station prototype.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Sierra Nevada Corporation</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>Yet another company, the Sierra Nevada Corporation, is working on a prototype of a three-story inflatable space habitat. Its design would enable it to either attach to the space station or <a href=\"https://www.space.com/sierra-nevada-inflatable-habitat-moon-gateway.html\">serve as a lunar base.</a> Known as the Large Inflatable Fabric Environment, or LIFE, the facility might even feature a microgravity garden that could supply space travelers with <a href=\"https://www.sncorp.com/what-we-do/environmental-systems/\">fresh produce</a>.</p><p>Sierra Nevada's senior vice president, Janet Kavandi, is also a retired NASA astronaut. She told Business Insider the inflatable habitat could serve multiple purposes in space, including as \"a manufacturing facility, a hotel, which some people might be interested in, or an observatory.\"</p><p>The eventual goal, she added, is \"replacing the existing space station with a new capability.\"</p><h2><strong>Blue Origin envisions 'fundamentally different' space habitats</strong></h2><p>While corporations like Bigelow and Axiom are using the ISS as a starting point for space habitats that could eventually become independent stations, others, like Blue Origin, are already working on standalone orbital habitats.&#160;</p><p>That company, owned by Amazon billionaire Jeff Bezos, envisions habitats far roomier and more luxurious than the ISS. A job posting from Blue Origin in September suggested that even its early stations would be \"fundamentally different from 'exploration' habitats designed for small, professionally trained crews in deep space.\"</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5cd4db92021b4c07d4482473?format=jpeg\" alt=\"blue moon lunar lander BlueOrigin_Colony Four\" height=\"1687\" width=\"3000\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>An artist&#39;s concept of an O&#39;Neill space colony, which could theoretically emulate Earth-like living conditions in space.\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.blueorigin.com/blue-moon\" target=\"_blank\">Blue Origin</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>In the long term, Bezos envisions massive habitats across the solar system that could house a <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/elon-musk-jeff-bezos-space-mars-colonies-spacex-blue-origin-2019-6\">space-based economy of millions of workers</a>, allowing heavy industry to move off our planet. The environments inside these habitats would simulate Earth's gravity and most ideal weather.&#160;&#160;</p><p>\"This is Maui on its best day, all year long,\" Bezos said in May 2019, <a href=\"https://www.theguardian.com/technology/2019/may/09/blue-origin-jeff-bezos-moon-announcement\">according to The Guardian</a>. \"No rain. No earthquakes. People are going to want to live here.\"</p><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a season","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/tech-gifts-for-women","description":"<p class=\"financial-disclaimer\"><i>When you buy through our links, we may earn money from our affiliate partners. href=\"https://www.anrdoezrs.net/links/6415797/type/dlg/https://www.fitbit.com/global/us/products/smartwatches/versa3\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\"><figure>\n\t<img Versa 3 makes a great gift for women who want a fitness tracker that doubles as a smartwatch.\n<p class=\"copyright\">Fitbit</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure></a></p><ul class=\"summary-list\"><li>Tech makes a great gift for anyone and everyone — no matter what time of year it is.</li><li>This holiday season, we've rounded up the best tech gifts for women, including good looking headphones, accessories for her phone, useful tech to make her life easier, and more.</li><li><strong>Shopping for more gifts? Read all of our <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-gift-ideas\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">gift ideas</a> in this helpful roundup of all our gift guides.</strong></li></ul><p>Every year, tech devices seem to get a little smarter and more useful. They make great gifts, too, because tech can be great for both entertainment and making life just a little bit easier.</p><p>As a tech editor with nearly a decade of experience testing new gadgets, I've pulled together a list of the best tech gifts for women that she'll actually like.</p><p>Whether the lady in your life wants <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-over-ear-headphones\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">a pair of fantastic headphones</a> that look good and sound great, hopes to <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-smartwatch-women\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">track her fitness in style</a>, or would love <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-iphone-accessories\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">cool accessories for her phone</a>, we have a tech gift for her in this guide.</p><h2>Top 5 tech gifts for women:</h2><ol><li><a target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow\">A Kindle Paperwhite ebook reader</a></li><li><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07HRGB6GP/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&tag=biip_102418_best-tech-gifts-women-20&camp=1789&creative=9325&linkCode=as2&creativeASIN=B07HRGB6GP&linkId=64b793484b7ffdb245abcf98b13b7dc94b7ffdb245abcf98b13b7dc9\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow sponsored nofollow sponsored\">A pretty wireless charger for her phone</a></li></ol>\n<div id=\"slideshow\">\n\tA phone grip and stand\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5e1def82f4423175bf3ae1b1?format=jpeg\" alt=\"PopSocket\" height=\"844\" width=\"1125\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">PopSocket</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=EHFxW6yx8Uo&#38;mid=43682&#38;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.popsockets.com%2F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">PopSocket Grip, available at PopSocket, from $10</a></h3><p>PopSocket grips make it super easy to hold even the largest of phones. The grips stick onto almost any phone case, pop out twice to give excellent grip, and double as a stand when she wants to watch videos. PopSockets come in a multitude of colors, patterns, and styles, so you'll be sure to find one she'll love. PopSockets also sells grips that give back to select charities. I have PopSocket grips on all the different phone cases I use because <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-iphone-accessories\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">I can't imagine using my phone without one</a>.</p>\n\tA leather wireless charger\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa02b0f6f5b310011724cb8?format=jpeg\" alt=\"Courant wireless charger\" height=\"843\" width=\"1125\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Courant</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=1252926&#38;u=1088116&#38;m=83231&#38;urllink=&#38;afftrack=\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored nofollow sponsored\">Courant wireless chargers, available at Courant, $80 to $175</a></h3><p>Wireless chargers don't have to be ugly or boring. Courant's wireless chargers and wirelessly charging battery packs are sophisticated and beautiful. They're covered in leather and come in a few classy colors, including off white, black, rose, and light blue. We've used these chargers ourselves, and we're certain she'll love them. We particularly like the catch-all that has a space for keys, wallets, jewelry, and any other small items she may have. You can also personalize it with a short phrase.</p>\n\tA smart display\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa0322b69331a0011bc6b61?format=jpeg\" alt=\"google nest hub\" height=\"1812\" width=\"2416\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Google</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://shop-links.co/1722661146958357128\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Google Nest Hub, available at Best Buy, $89.99</a></h3><p>The Google Nest Hub puts all the smarts of the Google Assistant into a smart home hub with screen. That way, she can see visual answers to her questions, the weather forecast, news reports, YouTube videos, and more right on the screen as the Assistant reads back the information. It also has a speaker, so she can play her favorite music. Plus, the Nest Hub can control smart home devices. I use this smart display on my desk in my home office.</p>\n\tA piece of smart jewelry\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa0335b69331a0011bc6b6a?format=jpeg\" alt=\"bellabeat leaf\" height=\"709\" width=\"946\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Bellabeat</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01LB4EUGS/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biip_102418_best-tech-gifts-women-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B01LB4EUGS&#38;linkId=0a2b51550b66f8233f474ee58b613736\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Bellabeat Leaf Urban</a> and <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B07HQWCDPY/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&#38;tag=biip_102418_best-tech-gifts-women-20&#38;camp=1789&#38;creative=9325&#38;linkCode=as2&#38;creativeASIN=B07HQWCDPY&#38;linkId=1646575525ff37c701531c5b5fbbc730\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow\">Leaf Chakra</a>, available at Amazon, from $100</h3><p>Bellabeat has been making <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/best-smart-jewelry\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">gorgeous pieces of smart jewelry</a> for years now, and the Leaf Urban and new Leaf Chakra make excellent gifts. Not only does Bellabeat's smart jewelry look fabulous as a necklace, bracelet, or brooch, it also packs a lot of smart features. The Leaf Urban and Chakra can track activity, mindfulness breathing exercises, and sleep patterns. It also doubles as a silent alarm so she'll awaken peacefully each morning. The company also has a <a href=\"https://www.bellabeat.com/products/leaf-crystal-bundle\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener nofollow nofollow\">new Leaf Crystal tracker</a> that has a Swarovski crystal on it for $199.00 (pictured above).</p>\n\tA bike mount for her phone\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa04e3069331a0011bc6c44?format=jpeg\" alt=\"QuadLock\" height=\"790\" width=\"1053\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">QuadLock</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://www.quadlockcase.com/products/products-bike-kit-universal-fit?variant=31220293861451\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Quad Lock Bike Kit Universal Mount, $54.90, available at QuadLock</a>&#160;</h3><p>Quad Lock's bike mount makes an excellent gift for any cyclist who likes to take her phone along for the ride. The company makes several versions, but this universal one will fit any phone, thanks to its two-part design. The adapter sticks to the back of a phone and locks into the bike mount securely. It's one of the best ones we've tried.</p>\n\tA smart herb garden\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa033f969331a0011bc6b72?format=jpeg\" alt=\"aerogarden harvest\" height=\"1282\" width=\"1709\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Aerogarden</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3>AeroGarden Harvest, available at <a href=\"https://go.skimresources.com?id=35871X943606&#38;xs=1&#38;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.walmart.com%2Fip%2FAeroGarden-Harvest-Black-with-Gourmet-Herbs-Seed-Kit%2F360148071%3F\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Walmart</a>&#160;and <a href=\"https://www.amazon.com/AeroGarden-901100-1200-Harvest-Black/dp/B07CKK8Z78/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener nofollow nofollow nofollow sponsored\">Amazon</a>, $99.97</h3><p>Who doesn't love fresh herbs? AeroGarden's Harvest herb garden isn't super high-tech, but it is techy in that it uses hydroponics to grow delicious herbs and other produce quickly without much effort on her part. All she has to do to get her herbs growing is pop the seed pods in the planter, give it water regularly, and add the included plant food now and then. The planter does the rest, providing light on a schedule, moving the water, and alerting her when it needs more. In our tests, <a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/aerogarden-harvest-review\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">we had great success with this garden</a>, and we're sure she will, too.</p>\n\tA well-made desk pad that looks nice\n\t<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fa0760a91178a0019b3dc8f?format=jpeg\" alt=\"grovemade desk pad\" height=\"733\" width=\"977\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Grovemade</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure>\n\t<h3><a href=\"https://grovemade.com/product/matte-desk-pad/?initial=536\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow noopener sponsored\">Grovemade Desk Pad, available at Grovemade, from $30</a></h3><p>Desk pads serve multiple functions: they make a desk look nicer, they protect the desk from spills, and they can also provide a nice uniform workspace. href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-is-forcing-marketers-to-rethink-holiday-strategies-2020-11\">Chipotle, Kohl's, and Peloton and other top marketers reveal how they're changing their ad strategies as the pandemic upends the holiday season</a></h3>\n  <ul>\n   <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-is-forcing-marketers-to-rethink-holiday-strategies-2020-11\">Facing an unprecedented holiday season this year, brands and retailers are changing everything from where they're advertising to the tone of the messages themselves, Tanya Dua reports.</a></li>\n   <li>Kohl's and Peloton are going for hope and community in their messaging while retailers like Banana Republic, Gap, and Macy's are doubling down on virtual events and e-commerce.</li>\n   <li>Some like Chipotle and Peloton are also personalizing their ads, since the pandemic's impact varies by area.</li>\n  </ul>\n </section>\n <h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/coronavirus-is-forcing-marketers-to-rethink-holiday-strategies-2020-11\">Read the full story advertisers continue to drive ad revenues</a></h3>\n   <ul>\n    <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/facebook-google-amazon-boast-major-q3-growth-2020-11\">The triopoly credited direct-response advertisers, especially in ecommerce, as major drivers of growth, in their better-than-expected third-quarter earnings.</a></li>\n    <li>Facebook COO Sheryl Sandberg said the ad rebound was driven by verticals including ecommerce, education, and other industries that \"lend themselves to online.\"</li>\n    <li>Dave Fildes, head of investor relations, said Amazon's priorities for the advertising business include making its tools easier to use as well as building out OTT video opportunities.</li>\n   </ul>\n  </section>\n  <h3><a <h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/gap-can-be-cool-again-by-being-more-relevant-cmo-2020-10\">Gap's new CMO has a plan to make it cool again: 'We all know that Gap has struggled over the past several years'</a></h3>\n    <ul>\n     <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/gap-can-be-cool-again-by-being-more-relevant-cmo-2020-10\">Madeline Stone talked to Gap's new CMO Mary Alderete about how she's going to make the brand more relevant.</a></li>\n     <li>Even before the pandemic, Gap was reporting slumping sales, and&nbsp;analysts were looking for more excitement&nbsp;to be infused into the brand. The clothing store's net sales dropped 28% in its most recent quarter, despite a 75% increase in e-commerce sales.</li>\n     <li>Alderate said recent ad campaigns promoting civic engagement, voting, and hopeful messages are one way Gap is connecting with shoppers during the pandemic. \"We're leading with the platform of modern American optimism,\" she said. \"That's our brand positioning, no matter what. Culturally relevant expressions of that optimism is what we will do every season.\"&nbsp;</li>\n    </ul>\n   </section>\n   <h3><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/gap-can-be-cool-again-by-being-more-relevant-cmo-2020-10\">Read the full story here.</a></h3>\n   <hr>\n    <h3>More stories we're reading:</h3>\n    <section>\n     <ul>\n      <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/how-much-money-instagram-influencer-makes-brand-deal-email-template-2020-10\">An Instagram influencer with about 40,000 followers explains how much money she makes and the email template she uses to turn gifting offers into paying deals</a> (Business Insider)</li>\n      <li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/shailesh-prakash-washington-post-amazon-jeff-bezos-aws-blue-origin-2020-11\">Meet the Washington Post executive working with Jeff Bezos to turbocharge the media titan's IT system</a> (Business Insider)</li>\n      <li><a href=\"https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2020-11-02/thriving-new-york-times-fox-news-ponder-a-post-trump-scenario\">Thriving New York Times, Fox News ponder a post-Trump scenario</a> (Bloomberg)</li>\n      <li><a href=\"https://www.mediapost.com/publications/article/357412/why-the-deprecation-of-cookies-may-not-be-such-a-b.html\">Why the deprecation of cookies may not be such a bad thing</a> (Mediapost)</li>\n      <li><a href=\"https://techcrunch.com/2020/11/02/tvision-funding/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noreferrer noopener\" data-qa=\"message_attachment_title_link\">TVision raises $16M to measure attention on connected TVs</a> (TechCrunch)</li>\n      <li><a href=\"https://nypost.com/2020/10/30/papa-johns-founder-slices-up-ad-firms-6m-extort-attempt/\">Papa John's founder slices up ad firm's $6M 'extort' attempt</a> (New York Post)\n       <ul id=\"mcs\"></ul></li>\n     </ul>\n    </section>\n    <section>\n     <p>Thanks for reading and see you tomorrow!
